snippet: President Obama’s comments, made at a news conference with the French president looking on, were provoked by French executives’ recent trips to Tehran.
abstract: Pres Obama vows to take action against companies that evade sanctions against Iran; pointed warning, made at news conference with French Pres Francois Hollande looking on, comes week after French business executives traveled to Tehran looking for business opportunities.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s comments, made at a news conference with the French president looking on, were provoked by French executives’ recent trips to Tehran.

headline.main: Obama Greets France’s Leader, but Warns Against Doing Business With Iran
headline.print_headline: Obama Greets France’s Leader, but Warns Against Doing Business With Iran
